name: Manipulated Logos
description: The shape of the world, the desire to seek, and the boundless space that gives them form. The intellect from which all wisdom is born. It is no longer a puppet, destined to perish in the funeral of knowledge, leaving behind an iron tombstone.

skills.name: Hail Chaos
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Foolish Pursuit
skills.description: Locks on to 1 ally target, enter the "Rebellious" state, "Anti-Creator" will use "Yield Not to Tyranny" on next action.

skills.name: Eradication of Falsehood
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to one designated target and adjacent targets.

skills.name: Immortal
skills.description: Immune to the effects of action bar changes, except "Anti-Creator." "Logos" cannot be eliminated. When receiving a killing blow, it enters the "Grave Wound" state, causing all targets to regenerate Energy and dispel the "<u>Action Lock</u>" state.

skills.name: Break the Old, Build the New
skills.description: Deals Quantum DMG to all targets and reduces target team's Skill Points by 1.

skills.name: A Fool's Defiance
skills.description: Enters the "Rebellious" state. "Anti-Creator" will use "The Crown of Divinity Shall Shatter" on next action.

skills.name: Eternal Recurrence
skills.description: When this unit enters the "Grave Wound" state, restore all HP and dispel the "Grave Wound" state on next action.
